title: Panel, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metallic thread
Technique: plain compound cloth, brocaded
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Ground fabric of dull blue plain cloth with extra wefts of silver thread shot through in alternate weft rows.  Small scale pattern pf stylized floral forms, arranged in horizontal rows, brocaded in silver gilt.
